com.nmi.uk.librarycl

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nmi.uk.librarycl.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A bean class utilising xml binding annotations, is dependent on Library.java. The class provides binding for the inner elements of the Library XML schema.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Construct a new book bean from the supplied parameters.
        Parameters:
        title - name of the book parsed form the XML document.

        category - name of the book category parsed form the XML document.
